snippet: GALPERIN--Gabriel. Born March 16, 1915. Devoted husband, beloved father, father-in-law, brother-in-law and uncle died on his 101st birthday in Delray Beach, Florida. Donations in his memory may be made to the Trustbridge Hospice at Delray Beach Medical Center, Delray Beach, Florida. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GALPERIN--Gabriel. Born March 16, 1915. Devoted husband, beloved father, father-in-law, brother-in-law and uncle died on his 101st birthday in Delray Beach, Florida. Donations in his memory may be made to the Trustbridge Hospice at Delray Beach Medical Center, Delray Beach, Florida. 1/3
